sentences: Radio-ohjelman viimeinen segmentti oli erityisen mielenkiintoinen.
Olemme jakaneet datan useisiin eri segmentteihin.
context: In Finnish, 'segmentti' is a loanword from English that means 'segment'. It refers to a distinct part or section of something larger. This word is commonly used in various contexts such as media (TV/radio segments), data analysis (data segments), film editing (movie segments), and business (market segments). The Finnish spelling follows the original English form but adheres to Finnish pronunciation rules.
